description.raw:
Already in use from a branch but let's merge this into default.

This implements the philosophy of separate the creation of a package and it's process of uploading to the OSRF repo and gazebosim.

* debbuild-base was modified to take care of only build the packages and export them to $WORKSPACE/pkgs/
* nightly-cleanup is run every time that repository uploader ends and take care of keeping only the last 5 generated nightly packages.
* repository_uploader is the one that takes the pkgs from debbuild and upload it to repo/gazebosim.
